title: New Leadership Must Remain Diligent, Keep Spending Capped (ATR - Americans for Tax Reform)
text: ( Source : ATR - Americans for Tax Reform ) When the Tea Party burst onto the political stage in 2009 the country was on the brink of financial disaster with a trillion dollar deficit growing by the minute. The movement was a direct response
